title: Support different queryAnalyzers / fieldTypes for different Spellcheckers to be used in Conjuction
description:
We need to make sure fieldType being specified for ConjuctionSolrSpellchecker / combination of spell checker as the tokens are generated from the spell query common for different spell checkers defined.

It would be nice addition to have the ability to specify different spell checker for different fields / fieldTypes / queryAnalyzers and then ConjuctionSolrSpellchecker combine /merge all the spell results from respective spellcheckers and output final spellcheck results.
